pl.touk.hades.load.statemachine
Class Machine

java.lang.Object
  pl.touk.hades.load.statemachine.Machine

public class Machine
extends Object

A deterministic finite-state machine that can be used to control failover activation. States are of type MachineState. The current state of the machine holds the current state of failover activation. When an input symbol L of type Load is provided a Transition T is made such that T.sourceState is equal to the current state, T.destinationState.load is equal to L and T is among possible transitions for this machine (possible transition are specified in the constructor).

A transition S1->S2 indicates a failover if S1.failoverActive == false and S2.failoverActive == true. A transition S1->S2 indicates a failback if S1.failoverActive == true and S2.failoverActive == false.

Author:
Michal Sokolowski

Field Detail

initialState

public static final MachineState initialState
Constructor Detail

Machine

public Machine(List<pl.touk.hades.load.statemachine.Transition> transitionList,
               MachineState start)
Creates a state machine with the given possible transitions. The machine's current state is set to the given state. The given possible transitions are checked to detect conflicting transitions. Transitions T1 and T2 are conflicting if T1.sourceState == T2.sourceState, T1.destinationState.load == T2.destinationState.load and T1.destinationState.failoverActive != T2.destinationState.failoverActive.

Parameters:
transitionList - possible transitions for the new machine
start - start state for the new machine
Throws:
IllegalArgumentException - if the given transition list contains conflicting transitions; or if the given start state is not a source for any of the given transitions

createStateMachine

public static Machine createStateMachine()

appendAllPossibleTransitionsBetweenStates

public static void appendAllPossibleTransitionsBetweenStates(Set<MachineState> states,
                                                             List<pl.touk.hades.load.statemachine.Transition> transitionList)
For the given set of states creates all possible transitions and appends them to the given transition list.

Parameters:
states - set of states for which all possible transitions should be created and added to the given transition list
transitionList - list of transitions which should be extended with all possible transitions between given states

appendAllPossibleTransitionsFromStates

public static void appendAllPossibleTransitionsFromStates(HashSet<MachineState> sourceStateSet,
                                                          MachineState destinationState,
                                                          ArrayList<pl.touk.hades.load.statemachine.Transition> transitions)
For the given set of source states and the given destination state creates all possible transitions and appends them to the given list of transitions.

Parameters:
sourceStateSet - set of source states for transitions that should be created
destinationState - destination state for transitions that should be created
transitions - transition list which the newly created transitions should be appended to

transition

public MachineState transition(MachineState fromState,
                               Load load)
Makes a transition from the given state fromState to such a state toState that toState.load == load and transition fromState->toState is among possible transitions of this machine (possible transitions are specified during machine creation).

Parameters:
fromState - state that the transition should be made from
load - input symbol that determines the transition
Returns:
state after the transition
